title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 06, 2024

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - Email - Complete Solutions

*   [Mox](https://www.xmox.nl/) - Complete e-mail solution with IMAP4, SMTP, SPF, DKIM, DMARC, MTA-STS, DANE and DNSSEC, reputation-based and content-based junk filtering, Internationalization (IDNA), automatic TLS with ACME and Let's Encrypt, account autoconfiguration, and webmail. ([Source Code (‚≠ê5.1k)](https://github.com/mjl-/mox)) `MIT` `Go`

### Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

*   [auto-mcs](https://www.auto-mcs.com) - Cross-platform Minecraft server manager. ([Source Code (‚≠ê281)](https://github.com/macarooni-man/auto-mcs)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [asciinema](https://asciinema.org/) - Web app for hosting asciicasts. ([Demo](https://asciinema.org/explore), [Source Code (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/asciinema/asciinema-server)) `Apache-2.0` `Elixir/Docker`

### Software / Photo Galleries

*   [Photofield (‚≠ê507)](https://github.com/SmilyOrg/photofield) - Experimental fast photo viewer. `MIT` `Docker/Go`
items.content_html:
Software / Communication - Email - Complete Solutions

  • Mox - Complete e-mail solution with IMAP4, SMTP, SPF, DKIM, DMARC, MTA-STS, DANE and DNSSEC, reputation-based and content-based junk filtering, Internationalization (IDNA), automatic TLS with ACME and Let's Encrypt, account autoconfiguration, and webmail. (Source Code (‚≠ê5.1k)) MIT Go

Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

  • auto-mcs - Cross-platform Minecraft server manager. (Source Code (‚≠ê281)) AGPL-3.0 Python

Software / Miscellaneous

  • asciinema - Web app for hosting asciicasts. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê2.4k)) Apache-2.0 Elixir/Docker

Software / Photo Galleries

  • Photofield (‚≠ê507) - Experimental fast photo viewer. MIT Docker/Go

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Charts / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [unovis (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/f5/unovis) - Modular data visualization framework for React, Angular, Svelte, Vue, and vanilla TypeScript or JavaScript.

### Data Grids / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-panemu-table (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/panemu/ngx-panemu-table) - An Angular table component. It is designed to be easy to use. Most work will be in TypeScript file, while the HTML file only needs to have a very simple `panemu-table` tag.
items.content_html:
Charts / Google Developer Experts

  • unovis (‚≠ê2.5k) - Modular data visualization framework for React, Angular, Svelte, Vue, and vanilla TypeScript or JavaScript.

Data Grids / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-panemu-table (‚≠ê11) - An Angular table component. It is designed to be easy to use. Most work will be in TypeScript file, while the HTML file only needs to have a very simple panemu-table tag.

items.title: Awesome Quantified Self
items.content_text:
### Applications and Platforms / Data Collection

*   [RTracker](https://janerob.com/rTracker/rTracker/iPhone/pages/rTracker-main.html) - Generic, customisable personal data tracker (iOS).
*   [Sink](https://sinkapp.io) - Voice-enabled Lifelogger for tracking anything with automatic sync to Google Sheets (iOS).

### Applications and Platforms / Time

*   [arbtt](https://arbtt.nomeata.de/) - Automatic, rule-based time tracker, which works by periodically snapshotting the metadata of your desktop window state. Rules are specified in the arbtt DSL and can be written retroactively (Linux, Mac, Windows).

### Applications and Platforms / Wealth

*   [Menot](https://www.menot.xyz) - Simple expense and finance tracker for multiple currencies, including crypto.

### Open Source Projects / Wealth

*   [Dogsheep](https://dogsheep.github.io/) - A collection of data exporters and tools for personal analytics using SQLite and/or Datasette.
*   [Chronicle (‚≠ê168)](https://github.com/chronicle-app/chronicle-etl) - A CLI toolkit for extracting and working with your digital history.
*   [QS-Schema (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/QS-Schema/qs-schema) - Open schemes for QS applications.
*   [Datasette (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/simonw/datasette) - An open source multi-tool for exploring and publishing data.
items.content_html:
Applications and Platforms / Data Collection

  • RTracker - Generic, customisable personal data tracker (iOS).
  • Sink - Voice-enabled Lifelogger for tracking anything with automatic sync to Google Sheets (iOS).

Applications and Platforms / Time

  • arbtt - Automatic, rule-based time tracker, which works by periodically snapshotting the metadata of your desktop window state. Rules are specified in the arbtt DSL and can be written retroactively (Linux, Mac, Windows).

Applications and Platforms / Wealth

  • Menot - Simple expense and finance tracker for multiple currencies, including crypto.

Open Source Projects / Wealth

  • Dogsheep - A collection of data exporters and tools for personal analytics using SQLite and/or Datasette.
  • Chronicle (‚≠ê168) - A CLI toolkit for extracting and working with your digital history.
  • QS-Schema (‚≠ê1) - Open schemes for QS applications.
  • Datasette (‚≠ê10k) - An open source multi-tool for exploring and publishing data.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### APIs, Data, and ML

*   [JSON Serve](https://jsonserve.com/) ‚Äî A free service that helps developers to store JSON objects and use that JSON as a REST API in their app.
items.content_html:
APIs, Data, and ML

  • JSON Serve ‚Äî A free service that helps developers to store JSON objects and use that JSON as a REST API in their app.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [nvm-deferred (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/davidparsson/zsh-nvm-deferred) - Defers loading of the `nvm` oh-my-zsh plugin using [zsh-defer (‚≠ê407)](https://github.com/romkatv/zsh-defer) to speed up shell startup.

### Themes / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [cr√®me fra√Æche (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/koenwoortman/creme-fraiche-zsh-theme) - Works best with light terminal backgrounds, includes `git` and `vi`-mode status decorations.
*   [cryptic (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/thederpykrafter/cryptic.zsh-theme) - Based on [aphrodite-terminal-theme (‚≠ê158)](https://github.com/win0err/aphrodite-terminal-theme). Includes decorators for current directory, `git` status, time, username, hostname and virtual environment.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • nvm-deferred (‚≠ê0) - Defers loading of the nvm oh-my-zsh plugin using zsh-defer (‚≠ê407) to speed up shell startup.

Themes / superconsole - Windows-only

  • cr√®me fra√Æche (‚≠ê3) - Works best with light terminal backgrounds, includes git and vi-mode status decorations.
  • cryptic (‚≠ê0) - Based on aphrodite-terminal-theme (‚≠ê158). Includes decorators for current directory, git status, time, username, hostname and virtual environment.
